document.full_text: north korea's kim jong-il and china's leaders vowed that their alliance "sealed in blood" will pass on to their successors, state media said on thursday, after kim wound up a visit to the powerful ally key to his plans for dynastic succession.
document.title: kim jong-il says china alliance to bridge generations
lines_and_colors: north korea's kim jong-il and china's leaders vowed that their alliance "sealed in blood" will pass on to their successors, state media said on thursday, after kim wound up a visit to the powerful ally key to his plans for dynastic succession.
